divs: Sighting DetailsArrived at work about 6:25 a.m. and after parking my car, I noticed how beautiful the sunrise was. The sky was basically filled with red clouds. I decided to take a picture of the sky with my phone camera, so I snapped the first picture, then walked a few paces so that I could get a clear photo without any light poles or obstructions. I snapped a few more pictures and then proceeded into work. When I looked at the photos that I had taken,I noticed what seemed to be two lights to the right of a cloud formation that I had photographed. I work for a helicopter manufacturer in the area, but we had no aircraft in the area at that time of the morning and commercial aircraft do not enter this airspace. I am not sure of what it is. Just thought you might be interested.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Stratford
There were no other sightings in Stratford on or around September 24th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Snapped picture of cloud formation/viewed photo later and noticed lights in picture
